alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 20 at 3:00AM PST until January 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ FRIDAY TO 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory today, north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory on Friday and Saturday, north winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The Colorado River Valley, including Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Fort Mohave, and Lake Havasu. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ Friday to 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous boating conditions. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wave heights between 1 and 2 feet expected this afternoon on area lakes. Wave heights between 1 and 3 feet expected Friday and Saturday on area lakes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
